**AHS:** `arr_dep`|**Schiphol:** The first 2 digits are taken.

**AHS:**

  • When `arr_dep` is “A“,
    then `inBoundCarrier` is set to "XQ".

  • When `arr_dep` is “D“,
    then Data Handling Operation.| |inBoundFlightNumber|`Turnaround Insights API`|`Turnaround AHS API`|**Schiphol:** `flight_designator_inbound`
    **AHS:** `arr_dep`, `fln`|**Schiphol:** The part that comes after the first 2 digits is taken.

    **AHS:**

    • When `arr_dep` is “A“,
      then `inBoundFlightNumber` is set to the part that
      comes after the space character of `fln`.

    • When `arr_dep` is “D“,
      then Data Handling Operation.| |outBoundFlightId| | | |**Schiphol:** Data Handling Operation
